---
title: "Extract bird metadata from googlesheet"
---

Procedure to extract bird metadata from the googlesheet and upload it as a json file in the application bucket.

```{R}
birds_md <- googlesheets4::read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1XiksWymZ8Mam9moxwTxwkK5UzuQ5KDzZRahdr72V-oM/edit?usp=sharing") |>
    janitor::clean_names()

tmp_rds <- tempfile(fileext = ".rds")
saveRDS(birds_md, tmp_rds)

googleCloudStorageR::gcs_auth("./nunatsiavut-birds-f33436183827.json")
bucket <- "bird-metadata"

googleCloudStorageR::gcs_upload(tmp_rds, name = "bird-metadata.rds", bucket = bucket, predefinedAcl = "bucketLevel")
```
